sentences.sContent: He tramped the streets looking for work.
sentences.sCn: 他在街上四处奔走，寻找工作。

synos.tran: 流浪；践踏，踩；脚步沉重地行走
流浪者；沉重的脚步声；徒步旅行

remMethod.val: t + ram(公羊) + p → 像公羊一样四处流浪 → 流浪者

trans.tranCn: 脚步沉重地走； 踩踏
trans.tranOther: to walk somewhere slowly and with heavy steps

trans.tranCn: 流浪者；长途跋涉，徒步旅行；沉重的脚步声；不定期货船
trans.tranOther: someone who has no home or job and moves from place to place, often asking for food or money
